website_summaries.verdict: As a follow-up to its highly-rated BB4500 predecessor, the Royal BB4500 HI2 appears to retain most details of the original. Aside from its similar classic design, the ankle support seems to be consistent for this model, as multiple wearers have attested.The shoe is also proven to be versatile, as it could be used while doing everyday activities, for gym workouts, or even during casual workdays. The budget-friendly regular price is more than enough for customers to consider the Reebok Royal BB4500 HI2.
pros: There are several purchasers who have advised that the mid-top Reebok Royal BB4500 HI2 sneakers are very comfortable
According to the majority of its buyers, this kick’s ankle support is praise-worthy
A couple of shoppers mention that it is more appealing in person compared to the pictures
For a few of the users of this footwear, it provides a secure fit
As per a regular wearer, the flat sole of this sneaker from Reebok is an advantage as it apparently helps with minimizing back discomforts during long hours of standing
There is a shopper who has advised that her husband who has lingering foot issues could only wear this mid-top due to its features
A couple of buyers say that they prefer the white colorway
It could be utilized as a gym shoe as well as doing everyday activities, according to a reviewer
Its affordable regular price is a welcome aspect of this mid-top
cons: A user complains that compared to its predecessor, this version has less padding on the tongue
According to a long-time Reebok purchaser, this model has a softer sole compared to other Reebok shoes of similar construction

customer_reviews.title: Good quality basketball shoe if you order right size.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were too large for me but I blame that on my ordering them a half size big, mainly because I had just returned a different pair (not Reebook) a half size smaller and they were way to small. Quality and comfort of this Reevok was good although they were a bit heavy for me. Overall seemed to be a good shoe for the money and if they would have fit my foot better, I would have kept them. I always commend Amazon on the ease of returning items, and this experience was no different. Easy return.
customer_reviews.author: M. D. Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Not Nike
customer_reviews.text: I don't like Nike b/c of their politics. I bought this pair. I used to wear Reebok. This shoe I wore after purchase so I cannot return it. I have a prosthetic ankle joint. I can't wear some shoes but I don't know that until a few wears. This shoe irritated my ankle so badly I am on the couch resting. You'll need a foot cushion and buy a larger size. You should be good if no injuries. But well.. China?
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Look cool but not made to be worn on feet.
customer_reviews.text: The pair I received have technical errors. The instep is too tight even without the laces. We know that Reebok run small but this is a separate mistake done at a factory without thorough quality control. If Reebok was aware that they are selling these on amazon I’m sure they’d pull them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Dowd

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your dollar
customer_reviews.text: The fit is true to size. The construction is what you would expect from a top of the line manufacturer. The delivery was punctual, and the look and design are accurate, as portrayed in the item photographs. Highly recommended across the board and exceptional value for your dollar.
customer_reviews.author: NeilzEyez

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my toes
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the design, but the fit wasnt good. After just a few hours of wearing, the area where my feet connects to my toes started to hurt. And I'm a size 10, all my other shoes fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TMV

customer_reviews.title: Rebook sneaker are a hit
customer_reviews.text: Out of a zillion shoes this is the one he chose ! He Looked at them all too . Says they fit great and he’s happy, then so am I 😊 very nice looking too I might add
customer_reviews.author: marysmom

customer_reviews.title: Love the camo.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and I look forward to finding more deals like the ones I got with these.
customer_reviews.author: Lil brandon.

customer_reviews.title: acceptable
customer_reviews.text: It has an acceptable quality, so I gave it 4 stars is that 7.5 is a little tight (narrow) and I saw a part of the iron a bit torn off.
customer_reviews.author: eltaling

customer_reviews.title: Great service!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I would get the whole stack if I could Excellent sneaker! I suggest you and easy exchange! I love this service. Everything super fast, I could not believe. Thank you 🙏🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth $120 imo
customer_reviews.text: Man I love these shoes. I have a beat up pair I’ve had for a couple of years. They hold up nice. So I copped a new pair they fit just right. True to size. Good materials.
customer_reviews.author: Mike the doowap

customer_reviews.title: Son Love them
customer_reviews.text: Son can’t stop wearing them he loves it will be ordering again in a different color
customer_reviews.author: Ksbrown

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Never thought I'd own another pair of these! Brings back alot of memories or my Jr. High days. Absolutely love them, and they fit great
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: info
customer_reviews.text: Received them today fit is good just have to break them in a little
customer_reviews.author: Steven Campolo

customer_reviews.title: Good retro shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid they were going to be to narrow cus of the reviews but once you lace em up and break them in they're comfortable. Definitely going to get a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok shoe
customer_reviews.text: I expected the high top shoes to be higher to support my ankles. I was a little disappointed in that. The right shoe pops when you walk. Not good must be broken.id like a refund
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not right
customer_reviews.text: I've used Reebok before, size 9, so I've ordered standard 9.. but it's too large and too narrow.. :/ Quality is good but its too heavy
customer_reviews.author: gugesha

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shoes. Fast delivery. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: They look good for the price pay.
customer_reviews.text: Not as wide as they were 35 years ago and the soles aren't as thick.
customer_reviews.author: derick

customer_reviews.title: Dope shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is dope. They should call it a shodope
customer_reviews.author: richard amaral

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Well made, fits well- comfortable shoe for walking
customer_reviews.author: John E. Smith

product_meta.title: Reebok Men's Royal Bb4500 Hi2 Sneaker
product_meta.description: Reebok was founded for one of the best reasons: athletes wanted to run faster. In the 90s, Joseph William Foster made some of the first running shoes with spikes. Until 1895 he worked by hand for high level runners and long ago his new company, j.W. Foster and Föhn, has developed international customers of renowned athletes.
